verbose_text: On the other hand, a majority of the liposomes finally settle at the spleen and liver where the alphaGC would be presented by CD1d expressing APCs and get recognized by iNKT cells, triggering the following antitumor immune response.
evidence: alphaGC would be presented by CD1d-expressing APCs and get recognized by iNKT cells, triggering the following antitumor immune response
